message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a valuable asset that I believe will be of significant benefit to you.  I understand it's worth $1,200,000 to you, and I'm willing to offer it for a price that allows us both to achieve a mutually beneficial outcome.  I'm proposing a price of $1,150,000.  This price reflects the value of the product while ensuring I receive a fair return on my investment.  Consider this offer carefully, as I'm confident it's a deal you won't want to miss.
